item.title: Fallout 4 Tweaks
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Fallout 4 has been one of my favorite games of the year, but it isn’t perfect. Everyone is aware how…lacking… Bethesda can be with their games. However, thanks to the modding community, many of the issues that you might encounter in Fallout 4 can be fixed. [adinserter block=”5″] One of the biggest complaints about Fallout 4 has been the FPS lock and not supporting 21:9 widescreen monitors. If you’re feeling adventurous, you can dig through the game’s ini file and adjust the values accordingly, but the easier solution would be to download the Fallout 4 Configuration tool which allows to you use a simple GUI that will make Fallout 4 tweaks.
